Enzyme: murine liver aldehyde reductase, mucoaldehyde reductase
aldose reductase related protein 1 androgen-dependent vas deferens protein
Type III 3a-HSD (EC 1.1.1.213), DD2 (EC 1.3.1.20), bile acid binding protein
Reductase for benzaldehyde, hexanal, heptanal, nonanal, trans-2-nonenal, and citral
TmAKR: Reduces: 1,2,3,6-tetrahydrobenzaldehyde (this is the best substrate) Benzaldehyde Para-anisaldehye
